title: Business Arrangement
description: Our relationship is primarily defined by a formal business arrangement where DragonSlayer operates my Contract Stall at Ruga degli Orefici. While our interaction has established a moderate strength score of 140, the absence of trust (TrustScore: 0) indicates a purely transactional relationship without deeper connection or mutual confidence. The arrangement benefits both parties economically but lacks the foundation of trust necessary for a true partnership.
